scripts.exe32: electron-packager . electron-quick-start --platform win32 --arch ia32 --out dist/ --ignore "(dist|node_modules/electron.*)" --icon resources/Icon.ico
scripts.exe64: electron-packager . electron-quick-start --platform win32 --arch x64 --out dist/ --ignore "(dist|node_modules/electron.*)" --icon resources/Icon.ico
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run exe32 && npm run set32 && npm run exe64 && npm run set64
